Description.$t: Zack's secret dream is to depose football star Buzz and claim the Prom King crown for his own (obviously superior) head. Can he sweet talk his way to that full-page yearbook spread?

GoalDescription.words: Naomi is chair of the prom planning committee. Getting in good with her could only help.
Buzz is the current chief contender for the Prom King throne. Try cutting him down to size.

Rule.$c: Predicate type="network" networkType="cool" first="Naomi" second="Buzz" comparator="lessthan" value="33" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make Buzz ###BUZZ### be a total doofus ###COOL DOWN### 2 times
Make Buzz ###BUZZ### have less than 2 friends ###NOT FRIENDS###

GoalDescription.words: Underneath that hair, Lil has the most beautiful eyes.  Probably.

Description.$t: Give Naomi and Zack something to talk about.
It all comes down to this.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh hey, Zack. Look, the results for the voting are in and...
...you didn't win. Buzz is going to be Prom King.
Hey, for what it's worth.... you ran a good campaign.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I came so close to achieving my dreams! And then I squandered everything I had with petty bickering!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I had to drop Honors English because of my yearbook editing duties, so I wouldn't know.
But didn't Shakespeare also say something about turning lemons into lemonade?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm pretty sure that was Gandhi.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! The guy from that hobbit movie?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know what, I changed my mind. I don't want to be Prom King anyway.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Zack, the votes are in, and I wanted you to be the first to know...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wow, thanks Naomi. I never thought I had a chance. What happened?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, there were certain voting irregularities. As chair of the committee, I'm not supposed to say anything...
...but it looks like every candidate other than you voted for themselves multiple times.
I normally wouldn't have looked at the handwriting that close, but the fact that we were friends and I knew how much this meant to you made me stop and check again.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Awe, thanks Naomi. You're the best.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm going to go tell the queen, too. Enjoy your last moment of being single, stud...
...cause you're about to be a high school celebrity.
A week ago everyone worshipped me and the ground I walked on.
There was no way anyone other than the Buzz was gonna get that Prom King crown.
Now everywhere I look people are pointing at me. And laughing.
And I'm sure you have something to do with it, geek.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's 'Your Majesty' to you, jock boy.

Ending.name: Dream Come True
Ending.$c: Smokin Date and Sweet Talk the Judge

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Zack, %r%, the results are in, and I wanted you to be the first to know...
YOU'RE THE PROM KING AND QUEEN!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wow, thanks Naomi. I never thought I had a chance. What happened?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Well, there were certain voting irregularities. As chair of the committee, I'm not supposed to say anything...
...but it looks like every candidate other than you voted for themselves multiple times.
I normally wouldn't have looked at the handwriting that close, but the fact that we were friends and I knew how much this meant to you made me stop and check again.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Aww, thanks Naomi. You're the best.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I'm going to go make the announcement. Enjoy your last dance in privacy, you two...
